thread.title: It's the People Who Make a Hotel Great!
thread.title_full: It's the People Who Make a Hotel Great! - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vinalbany
title: It's the People Who Make a Hotel Great!
text:
The Chandler is a wonderful boutique hotel located 4 blocks from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station (though it's technically on the East Side). It's a lovely property and well priced for VERY comfortable and surprisingly spacious accommodations. But what moves it up the scale from Very Good to Excellent (X2!) are the staff. The front desk folks (we love you, Susan) and the astonishingly handsome, debonair and amusing concierge, Adonis (no kidding) will do anything to make your stay at the Hotel Chandler absolutely delightful. Believe me: you can have a great time just hanging out in the lobby!
Room Tip: Corner suites worth the few extra dollars. Also, consider +breakfast packages. Prices modest by NYC... See more room tips
